title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: The ministry has organized the country into five regions with 5 Health Regional Councils (CRS) and 5 Regional Health Observatories (RHAs). At the Provincial level, there are 48 Directorates of Health and Population (one per province). The current minister is Abdelhak Saihi (since 9 September 2022).

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Formerly named the Ministry of Health and Population (Ministère de la Santé et de la Population)

title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform
url: https://www.aps.dz/en/health-science-technology/tag/Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform
snippet: ALGIERS- A total of 98 new confirmed Covid-19 cases, 69 recoveries and five deaths were recorded in the last 24 hours in Algeria, announced Monday the Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform.
